name: Hazelwood Jade-Backed Chair
description: A high-back chair found at the Curatorium of Secrets in Nasha Town. Crafted primarily from hazelnut wood, it features jade-green cushioning on both the seat and backrest. This is a piece that combines elegance with comfort.\nVisitors to the Curatorium of Secrets often arrive anxious or weighed down by their worries. As such, anyone composed enough to notice just how special this chair is must possess exceptional mental fortitude, and such a visitor is sure to receive the Curatorium's utmost hospitality.
